name: Dino Basket
description:
A small prototype of a freestyle 1v1 basket game with tiny dinosaurs that use a ham as a ball to feed their elders. There is also a solo mode. It's better to play with controllers.

More infos about the project on my website: https://www.alexandretournois.com/projects/elementals/

Some details about scoring : there are multiple ways to improve your points :

Classic Shot : as long as the ball ends up in the big dino mouth, you get a point

You can get extra points with :

Dunk : if you bring it by hand

Long Shot : if you shoot from far enough

Air Shot : if you shoot while being in air

Over Shot : if you shoot while being over the ball

Flow : you shoot while in action without catching the ball nor the ball hitting the ground

Freestyle : you do a baskflip while shooting or before shooting

Juggle : you keep the ball balancing on your head for some seconds before shooting (the bonus stays as long as it doesn't hit the ground)
